prefercite.head: Preferred Citation

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This holding was purchased on October 20, 1967.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This holding contains the manuscript for Louise Imogen Guiney's poem "Talisman" and a letter to Small, Maynard, and Company.

did.unittitle: Letter to Small, Maynard and Company December 7, 1899
